---
id: _third_party_balance_balanceget
title: Get a single currency asset
sidebar_label: Get a single currency asset
description: /spot/v4/balance
---

## 接口

**GET** `/spot/v4/balance`

## 请求参数

| 名称       | 类型   | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明    | 范围 |
| ---------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ------- | ---- |
| `currency` | string | 是   |        | eg:usdt |      |

## 示例请求

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "currency": "usdt",
    "currencyId": 0,
    "frozenAmount": 0,
    "availableAmount": 0,
    "totalAmount": 0,
    "convertBtcAmount": 0 //Converted BTC amount
  }
}
```
